titles.title: Daylight Saving Time Extension Act of 1993
To provide for daylight saving time on an expanded basis, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E847-848)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Act of 1995 - Establishes: (1) the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor in the State of South Carolina; and (2) the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Commission to assist Federal, State, and local authorities and the private sector in developing and implementing an integrated management action plan for the Corridor. Authorizes appropriations.
